title: Grab your logo sweatshirt – Gap is making a surprise fashion comeback
description: Dresses from 90s brand grace red carpet after rough patch in which brand closed stores and broke tie with Kanye WestThis year’s awards season brought a surprise fashion comeback: Gap. Everyone from Timothée Chalamet and Demi Moore to Cynthia Erivo and Anne Hathaway has worn the US high-street brand on the red carpet in the past year, and this month parent company Gap Inc released its most recent financial results – with sales up 7%.Joy Montgomery, commerce editor at Vogue, describes Hathaway’s decision to wear a luxe version of a white shirt dress later sold in store, which the actor wore to a Bulgari event last year – as “a moment that the fashion world sat up and realised that something was changing”. Continue reading...

title: 7 Haitian Brands You Need To Up Your Fashion & Beauty Game
description: Haiti's history is filled with vibrant cultural traditions and a spirit of resilience, marked by both periods of massive prosperity and profound struggle. The once-thriving Saint-Domingue was a key producer of sugar, coffee, textile production and much more. However, the country experienced a devastating transition following its independence from France in 1804. Despite the challenges of political instability, natural disasters, and economic hardship that still persist, Haiti's creative pulse remains unshaken. Today, a new generation of Haitian creatives, including designers, makeup artists, and beauty entrepreneurs, are making their mark on the global stage—blending heritage with innovation. While many brands are taking the industry by storm, here are seven dynamic Haitian fashion and beauty brands that reflect the island's creative Caribbean flair and heritage, shaping its promising future built on its rich, complex past.Designed by Haitian-American fashion designer Dayanne Danier, Bien Abyé (which means "Well Dressed" in French Creole) offers a variety of handcrafted detailed accessories made by artisans in Haiti. Whether you're looking for scarves, facemasks, headbands or handbags, Danier prides herself on showcasing her creative inspiration through her work, drawing from her Creole roots and Haiti's one-of-a-kind architectural legacy. Bien Abyé Garden View Silk Scarf, $175.00, available at Nordstrom.Bien Abyé Garden View Silk Scarf, $, available at NordstromEstablished in 2013, Fanm Mon celebrates Haitian heritage through vibrant, beautifully crafted clothing. Their designs not only feature detailed embroidery and rich colors, but each piece tells a unique story inspired by Haiti's natural beauty and cultural traditions. The brand is also deeply committed to ethical production, which further adds to the powerful connection between the garments and their wearers.Fanm Mon Kelly Dress $229.00, available at Fanm Mon.Fanm Mon https://fanmmon.com/products/kelly?variant=408045511640, $, available at Fanm MonDeux Mains isn't just making beautiful leather goods; they're changing lives in Haiti. The company trains and employs local artisans, giving them skills and a fair wage, so your purchase is helping build a stronger community. Their designs are also aesthetically pleasing, showcasing great craftsmanship and quality. Deux Mains Wiline Horn Earrings, $75.00, available at Wolf & Badger.Deux Mains https://www.wolfandbadger.com/us/wiline-horn-earrings/, $, available at Wolf & BadgerIf you're looking for wearable art that sparks meaningful conversations about Black history and culture, look no further than Pyer Moss. Kerby Jean-Raymond is the creative force behind the brand, which is known for innovative shows and pushing the envelope with its designs to tell powerful stories that reflect historical references to Black identity. It's no wonder why major retailers such as Reebok previously joined forces with the Haitian-American fashion label. Pyer Moss Cropped Logo Turtleneck Top, $47.99, available at Saks Fifth Avenue.Pyer Moss https://www.saksfifthavenue.com/product/pyer-moss-x-ree, $, available at Saks Fifth AvenueAromatic Perfume Oils was created by Tatiana Fortune with the promise of cruelty-free, phthalate-free, and alcohol-free ingredients. The company is known for a product line that is carefully formulated with research-backed ingredients. With each product Fortune infuses a rich spirit of empowerment and cultural richness. Aromatic Perfume Oils, Significance Perfume Oil, $32.00, available at Aromatic Perfume Oils.Aromatic Perfume Oils https://aromaticperfumeoils.com/collections/perfumeoils, $, available at Aromatic Perfume OilsFashion designer Stella Jean, known as the "Bridge Connector," has achieved massive success and widespread acclaim. Born to an  Italian father and a Haitian mother, her designs embody multiculturalism, blending bold patterns and classic tailoring to achieve a perfectly fitted aesthetic. Stella Jean Embroidered Short-Sleeve Shift Minidress, $374.99, available at Saks Fifth Avenue.Stella Jean https://www.saksfifthavenue.com/product/stella-jean-emb, $, available at Saks Fifth AvenueKreyòl Essence (KE) is an eco-friendly brand that uses indigenous ingredients from Caribbean farms with clinically backed scalp and skin care products, specifically from Haiti. The brand's product formulations focus on hair loss, eczema, and dryness while achieving results extending from glowing skin to growing natural, healthy hair. Kreyòl Essence Haitian Black Castor Oil - Rosemary Mint, $20.00, available at Ulta Beauty.Kreyol Essence https://www.ulta.com/p/haitian-black-castor-oil-rosemar, $, available at Ulta BeautyLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?24 Caribbean-Owned Fashion Brands To Shop NowNew Publisher Specializes In Black Fashion HistoryThe Coolest Black-Owned Beauty Brands To Try ASAP
author: Dontaira Terrell

title: The 23 Best Matching Sweatsuit & Lounge Sets To Live In Year-Round
description: As much as we love diving headfirst into the latest fashion trends, there’s no denying the magnetic pull of a matching sweatsuit or lounge set. They’re cozy, they’re comfy, they’re cute — and when made with quality and care, they’re built to last. Plus, let’s talk versatility. Toeing the line between sporty athleisure and polished co-ords, sweatsuits are the ultimate shortcut to looking casual yet put-together. Throw one on when you can't be bothered to style an outfit. Or default to your favorite when tackling a week’s worth of chores in a few hours. Working remotely and need to feel slightly more “dressed” than your pajamas? Problem solved. And on travel days? Sweat sets are an MVP for curling up on chilly flights. Bonus: You can break up a set and wear each piece separately, unlocking endless mix-and-match potential for those moments when you actually want to plan an outfit.If you’re ready to retire those ratty, holey sweats that have seen you through college and countless days under your duvet (no judgment — we’ve all got that pair), consider yourself covered. Ahead, discover 23 top-quality, stylish sweatsuit sets from retailers we love and trust. Whether you’re looking for lightweight short sets and breathable cotton co-ords for warm weather or weighty and more structured layers for winter hibernation mode, you’ll find your new go-to right here.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.GapReaders have been loving Gap’s sweats of late, and these coordinates in the color we (and every fashion girly) are living for right now — butter yellow — are too good. Fair warning: the crewneck sweatshirt is already sold out. Womp. But I personally love a good long-sleeve tee with cozy joggers and wide legs for everything from WFH days to grocery runs and travel days.Gap Heavyweight Rib Cropped Boatneck T-Shirt, $, available at GapGap Heavyweight French Terry Seamed Wide-Leg Sweatpants, $, available at GapFree People Free-est We’re long-time fans of Free People’s lounge and activewear offerings (especially FP Movement and Free-est), and this sweater knit set is a standout. Available in 12 colors, from easy neutrals to rich jewel tones shades, it’s perfect for everything from at-home happy hour to snuggly winter days in the mountains.free-est Solar Sweater Set, $, available at Free PeopleSPANXSlip into this serene Spanx sweatsuit, where the ultra-soft and airy fabric feels like a gentle cloud against your skin. With its relaxed fit and soothing sage red hue, these coordinates deliver a dreamy mix of comfort and bold style.SPANX AirEssentials Half Zip, $, available at SPANXSPANX AirEssentials Wide Leg Pant, $, available at SPANXAbercrombie & FitchEveryone loves Abercrombie’s jeans, but its activewear and loungewear deserve a shoutout. Made from neoKNIT — a special material made from layers of sweat-wicking neoprene — they’re thick but soft and just the thing for your next hot girl walk.Abercrombie & Fitch YPB neoKNIT V-Neck, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch YPB neoKNIT Wide Leg Sweatpant, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchAritziaOf course, everyone's favorite shop for wardrobe basics has hoodies that "hoodie" better than most in existence. The Cozy Fleece fabric is like wearing a cloud, while the oversized fit will keep you snug as a bug all season long.Aritzia Cozy Sweatfleece Perfect Crew Sweatshirt, $, available at AritziaAritzia Cozy Sweatfleece Perfect Hi-rise Mini Short, $, available at AritziaLululemonA Lululemon set for travel just makes sense. The plush fleece, roomy fit, and pockets make it practical yet undeniably cozy on early-morning flights — no wonder these are an internet sensation. Plus, the pants come in short, regular, and tall sizes, making the set even better.Lululemon Scuba Full-Zip Hoodie, $, available at LululemonLululemon Scuba Mid-Rise Oversized Jogger, $, available at LululemonMate The Label Made with 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton, Mate The Label’s sweats are eco-friendly without sacrificing style. Plus, the brand's organic cotton uses less water and carbon emissions — snaps for sustainable efforts. Mate The Label Organic Fleece Oversized Sweatshirt, $, available at Mate the LabelMate The Label Organic Fleece Relaxed Pocket Sweatpant, $, available at Mate the LabelLakeTrue to its name, the Relax Shorts Set is perfect for some much-needed R&R. And even if you can’t take a break, the dreamy fabric will put you in a more tranquil state of mind at the very least. LAKE Relax Shorts Set, $, available at LAKEDaily Practice by AnthropologieAnthropologie's label Daily Practice delivers casual loungewear with an elevated, everyday feel. This gray set caught our eye, especially for the voluminous joggers offering a bolder fit.Daily Practice by Anthropologie Zola Joggers, $, available at AnthropologieDaily Practice by Anthropologie Oversized Pullover Sweatshirt, $, available at AnthropologiePangaiaPangaia brings bold colors and sustainable materials to your downtime style. If you’re a color lover, this set is a so-fun and eco-friendly take on loungewear.Everlane Black is anything but boring in the case of this half-zip and barrel sweatpant combo. Toss on a baseball cap and trench coat, and you’re serving achingly cool off-duty vibes.Everlane The Laid-Back Half-Zip Sweatshirt, $, available at EverlaneEverlane The Laid-Back Sweatpant, $, available at EverlaneAlo YogaAlo is best for its fashion-forward range of yoga attire and workout sets, but the sweatsuits are equally on point. Refinery 29 fashion director Irina Grechko swears by this set (which she has in gray and white) for peak cozy vibes. This new mushroom hue is next on her list.Alo Accolade Straight Leg Sweatpant, $, available at AloAlo Yoga Accolade Crew Neck Pullover, $, available at AloOld NavyLive your best minimalist life in this cozy and affordable set. While the women’s pants in heather oatmeal are sold out, we’re not afraid to dip into the men’s section — just size down for that perfectly roomy fit. Old Navy Half-Zip Bounce Fleece Pullover, $, available at Old NavyOld Navy Rotation Jogger Sweatpants, $, available at Old NavySavage x FentyMeet your new go-to for lounging in style: the Savage X Fenty lounge set. With a relaxed fit, 3-D puff logo, and major comfort factor, it's as easy as it gets, whether you’re chilling at home or stepping out.Savage x Fenty Weekender Terry Sweatpant, $, available at Savage x FentySavage x Fenty Weekender Terry Sweatshirt, $, available at Savage x FentyVuoriVuori's lounge-meets-activewear options are made from the softest DreamKnitfabric (a brand signature). With a relaxed fit, moisture-wicking properties, and four-way stretch, they do the most (in a chill sort of way).Vuori Halo Modern Full Zip Hoodie, $, available at VuoriVuori Performance Jogger, $, available at VuoriVarleySnatch that waist in the most comfortable way with Varley’s long tunic-esque top and jogger set — cozy and undeniably sleek. The pants also come in a longer inseam for all the tall girlies.Varley Freya Sweat, $, available at VarleyVarley The Slim Pant 25", $, available at VarleyDonniThese ribbed kick-flare pants are the ultimate hack for looking put-together with a lounge-y feel, especially when paired with the coordinating hoodie. The timeless black hue elevates them even further — so versatile.Donni The Eco-Fleece Hoodie, $, available at DonniDonni The Tall Rib Kick Flare, $, available at DonniSplits59Trackstar but make it minimalist with this new set from Splits59 — purveyors of ultra-light, ultra-soft loungewear. Opt for the coordinating crewneck for mega-lounge-ability or the matching bodysuit if you’re after a uniquely sleek alternative. Splits59 Sonja Fleece Sweatshirt, $, available at Splits59Splits59 Luca Airweight Trouser with Stripe, $, available at Splits59SummersaltSummersalt is best known for its swimwear, but its loungewear offerings are just as noteworthy, going up to 2X. This cashmere-blend set is a cozy queen’s dream — elevated, plush, and not too hard on the wallet. Summersalt The Coziest Cashmere Blend Hoodie, $, available at SummersaltSummersalt The Coziest Cashmere Blend Jogger, $, available at SummersaltRhoneAnother dreamy-soft fabric that’s somehow both crazy lightweight and warm — seriously, how? And this silver-gray hue? So fresh. Rhone DreamGlow Half Zip, $, available at NordstromRhone DreamGlow Joggers, $, available at NordstromJenni KayneJenni Kayne — a.k.a.,  everyone's favorite luxury knitwear designer —  brings the same softness to the label’s matching sweat sets. This one is the definition of low-key luxury.Jenni Kayne Saturday Sweatshirt, $, available at Jenni KayneJenni Kayne Saturday Sweatpant, $, available at Jenni KayneCarbon38Cloud soft and elegant, this set features thick brushed fabric that feels luxe yet pliable — never stiff — with a polished look that rivals your favorite tailored separates.Carbon38 Drapey Knit Sweatshirt in Interlock, $, available at Carbon38Carbon38 Tapered Leg Jogger in Interlock, $, available at Carbon38Perfectdd This one’s for the full-busted girls. Alice Kim launched PerfectDD after struggling to find pieces that fit her petite frame and size 32DD breasts. The designs are tailored with extra room at the bust only — no tent-like fits here (IYKYK). Sizes accommodate DD to M cups.Perfectdd Charisse L/S Sweatshirt, $, available at PerfectddPerfectdd Sweat Shorts, $, available at PerfectddLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?14 Comfy Sweatpants R29 Editors & Readers Swear ByBest Free People Summer Co-Ords & Matching SetsThese Lululemon Pieces Make Perfect Travel Outfits
author: Esther Newman

title: 13 Comfortable Work Shoes For the Office and Beyond
description: When finding the perfect pair of work shoes, style ranks high on our wish lists but, naturally, so does comfort. From the subway to the office to after-work cocktails with your friends and beyond, these are the shoes you'll practically be living in daily, so it's important to shop for a pair that'll keep you feeling comfortable, supported, and chic. Ahead, we curated a list of this season's best and most comfortable work shoes for women, from slingback heels and black flats to business-casual shoes that can meet any office's dress-code requirements. Most importantly, they all have one thing in common: they'll become your go-to everyday pair. Depending on your job or daily journey, your comfort (and commute) requirements might have different needs. If you work in a more dressed-up environment with a walking commute, opt for classic, comfortable flats that you can wear with trousers. If your workplace is more casual and you drive, you can probably get away with wearing a pair of heels to spice things up. And, of course, we also made sure to include some versatile sneakers that pair well with all clothing items - and are even favorites of our own editors. Keep reading for our complete guide to the best women's work shoes. With styles from brands like Old Navy, Rothy's, and Everlane, there's something at every price point and markdown. Find your favorites and shop this season's best comfortable work shoes for standing all day.
author: Kyley Warren

title: The 16 Most Comfortable Walking Shoes For Every Occasion
description: Having comfortable walking shoes incorporated into your wardrobe is a no-brainer, especially if you travel regularly, have an unbearably long commute to the office, or a job where you're standing all day. When shopping for the best walking shoes, it's important to look for pairs that are versatile enough to keep you feeling both supported and chic, regardless of where your day takes you. We find that fashionable walking shoes are the perfect happy medium, because they not only look good with all of your favorite outfits, but they're also the exact type of shoe we want to slip into for a concert or when we're out exploring a new city. Alternatively, if you love to take long walks around the neighborhood or to your local coffee shop, it's essential that you have a great pair of stylish walking shoes on hand. It's not always easy to find the best of both worlds with style and comfort, but we're here to make it possible. Ahead, we rounded up the most comfortable walking shoes that'll look great with all your outfits, from sleek trousers to stretchy, lift-me-up leggings - and they'll also give your feet the support they need for long excursions. Whether you're looking for the best sneakers for walking, are in the market for a pair of classic white sneakers, or simply want to stock up on good shoes for walking all day, we have no doubt you'll be able to find your new favorite wardrobe essential here. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best shoes for walking and standing all day. These comfortable walking shoes are options you'll want to slip into time and time again.
author: Kyley Warren
